members.name: Lukasz Szulczewski
members.about: is the manager and head barista of The Peanut Vendor Coffee Project, a speciality coffee shop serving selection of highest quality coffees and teas in a manner that is both very opinionated and highly appreciated among London coffee geeks. He has years of experience of work in hospitality, customer service and management of staff in retail and consumer facing businesses.

members.name: Rafal Szulczewski
members.about: a digital producer and web programmer at night is also a barista at The Peanut Vendor Coffee Project. experience with digital media and tendency to establish most unlikely associations means he often finds himself being responsible for maintaining relationships with clients and ultimately for packaging and delivery of the product to the end user.

members.name: Viktor Achim
members.about: is a Hungarian born chef currently 2nd in charge at Well Street Kitchen where he has been serving breakfast classics and their creative alternatives, as well as hearty lunchtime fare for over two years. He has years of experience as a chef both in his home country as well as in the UK. He is both reliable and committed to provide consistently great quality food expected by his clients as well as keen to experiment with different cuisines and styles of cooking.

members.name: Viktor Achim
members.about: is the lose cannon, well manners, smile and pleasure of the Coffee Project. Responsible for maintaining his finger nails and watering the plants he also writes on topics ranging from culinary adventures to all those things you might not necessarily want to know about at this particular moment. he is a fashion stylist and has great attention to detail with some coffee making abilities.
